bs-expiry-extension-description: Pages can be marked as expired.
bs_expiry-unexpire-unsuccess: The page could not be unexpired
bs-expiry-text-delete: Do you really want to delete {{PLURAL:$1|this expiry|these $1 expiries}}?
bs-expiry-info-dialog-expiry-not-set: This page is not set to expire!
bs-expiry-edit-grid-empty: No edits since the page expired
bs-expiry-alert-body-expired: This page expired on $1. Please check the content.
apihelp-bs-expiry-tasks-summary: Provides tasks such as editing or deleting expiries
apihelp-bs-expiry-store-summary: Provides a store for expires, that can be queried
bs-expiry-smwpropertyvalueprovider-expir: Date for when the page expires
bs-expiry-smwpropertyvalueprovider-isexp: Tells if the page has expired
bs-expiry-dialog-delete-prompt: Are you sure you want to delete expiry for this page?
bs-expiry-dialog-create-reminder-prompt: Do you want to create a reminder for this page?
log-description-bs-expiry: Log of actions regarding page expiration
bs-expiry-event-today:
Page $1 expires today.

Please check the content of the page to decide whether it needs to be updated.
bs-expiry-event-today-with-comment:
Page $1 expires today.

Please check the content of the page to decide whether it needs to be updated.

Comment from the expiry:
$2
bs-expiry-event-one-week:
Page $1 expires in one week.

Please check the content of the page to decide whether it needs to be updated.
bs-expiry-event-one-week-with-comment:
Page $1 expires in one week.

Please check the content of the page to decide whether it needs to be updated.

Comment from the expiry:
$2
bs-expiry-pref-enable-page-watermark-hel: Adds a watermark on an expired page
bs-expiry-pref-enable-pdf-watermark-help: Adds a watermark for expired pages in PDF output
bs-expiry-event-expiry-today-desc: The page is marked as expired today
bs-expiry-event-expiry-one-week-desc: The page counts as expired in one week
